summary: This is my first mod so yes i am new to this see long description for more
descriptionHtml: The Follower is located in [u][b]Four Shields Tavern in Dragon Bridge[/b][/u]    *note* he was origionaly going to be a Fennec so if you want to install the fennec race mod go to four shields tavern click the tilda key ( left of 1 under esc ) then type  [u][b]setrace Fennec[/b][/u] and he will change to how he was soposed to be! :D please tell me if any problems with mod!
author: FazicGamer
